fullText: Mr. Driver makes Pale's self-absorption magnetic instead of merely repulsive, and Ms. Russell finds the tough core beneath Anna's apparent fragility.
dtliExcerpt: Mr. Driver makes Pale's self-absorption magnetic instead of merely repulsive, and Ms. Russell finds the tough core beneath Anna's apparent fragility.
